define: Get the authorised reseller brand list for the shop.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"kkEhptM"},{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the \"page_no\" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 30.

","name":"page_size","sample":"10","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"ejJeBxc"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"mcNfdmw"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fPfbcRk"},{"description":"

","name":"request_id","sample":"b8b833d5a7284dfd80f3fe8b108a1a15","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dKeWKfS"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"SFZnGW","children":[{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the shop is authorised reseller.

","name":"is_authorised_reseller","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"saawiJn"},{"description":"

The number of authorised brand linked with the shop.

","name":"total_count","sample":"12","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"pMTbpSE"},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the authorised brand list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of authorised brand.

","name":"more","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"FBBRyeh"},{"description":"","name":"authorised_brand_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"eTJjebR","children":[{"description":"

ID of the authorised brand, it may be the same in different regions.

","name":"brand_id","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"tdWTexH"},{"description":"

Name of the authorised brand.

","name":"brand_name","sample":"test brand","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WXYNScS"}]}]}]}
